typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Templates
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system for document templates.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.templates.TemplateFieldDefinition
typeDescription.description: A field definition in a template document.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the identified template field.

featureDescription.name: regex
featureDescription.description: An optional regular expresison to extract the field from the structural element.

featureDescription.name: defaultValue
featureDescription.description: An optional default value to be used if the field is not matched for the record.

featureDescription.name: required
featureDescription.description: Set true to declare that the field is required. If a default is set, this is redundant as it will always exist

featureDescription.name: repeat
featureDescription.description: Indicate that this field can be repeated in the document.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.templates.TemplateField
typeDescription.description: An field identified from a template

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the identified template field.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: An value assigned to this field. Typically taken from the text, but can be assigned using default value.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.templates.TemplateRecordDefinition
typeDescription.description: Beginning / end marker of a record (multiple fields) in a template document, used to create record definitions for subsequent annotation of real documents.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the record, eg Address

featureDescription.name: repeat
featureDescription.description: Declare that this record is repeatable in the document. For example, a repeating record spaning a row of a table would create a record for each row in the table.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.templates.TemplateRecord
typeDescription.description: A covering annotation that marks the extent of a record within an annotated document.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the record, eg Address

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: The source of the record definition
